articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: WHO slams US-funded newborn vaccine trial as "unethical" - Ars Technica
articles.description: CDC awarded $1.6 million for study birth dose of hepatitis B vaccine in Guinea-Bissau.

articles.author: Max Planck Society
articles.title: Gravitational lensing technique unveils supermassive black hole pairs - Phys.org
articles.description: Supermassive black hole binaries form naturally when galaxies merge, but scientists have only confidently observed a very few of these systems that are widely separated. Black hole binaries that closely orbit each other have not yet been measured. In a paper …
